channel.title: 317 help
channel.description:
I actually haven't coded a 317 in about 1 1/2 yrs because i was more of a 508+ coder so i have one question that i cant do but here it is *Don't flame me*
How do i make the magic spell called "vengeance" Free of no charge like i don't want my players to have to get runes to use vengeance i want them to just click on it and it vengeance wait 30 sec and vengeance again how can i do that?
Can some1 please give me a step by step instruction's thx
